results.title: Tallinn Christmas Market – 21.11 – 28.12.2025
results.content: Tallinn Christmas Market On 21 November, Town Hall Square in the heart of Tallinn’s medieval Old Town will once again be transformed into a small piece of a Christmas fairy tale: the traditional Tallinn Christmas Market will open its “imaginary gates” for the 25th time. The Tallinn Christmas Market will remain open until the evening of 28 December, but the Christmas fairy tale does not end there: the Christmas tree will stay on Town Hall Square for several more weeks, and the story continues throughout the festively decorated Old Town! #### Christmas Market at the Town Hall Square in Tallinn, 21 November – 28 December 2025

results.title: 2025 Tallinn Christmas Market Travel Guide - Andrew & Kait
results.content: ## **Tallinn Christmas Market Location** As you wander through the enchanting Old Town of Tallinn during the Christmas season, you'll discover that the main Christmas Market unfolds as a captivating centerpiece, radiating festive cheer throughout the historic heart of the city. **Tallinn's Must-Visit Christmas Market - Town Hall Square (Raekoja plats):** It's the central point from which your Tallinn Christmas Market adventure will likely begin and where you'll find the most comprehensive Christmas experience. ## **When Is the Tallinn Christmas Market Open?** ## **Food & Drinks to Try at Tallinn’s Christmas Market** **Glögi (Mulled Wine):** No Christmas market experience is complete without a mug of warm, spiced mulled wine, and Tallinn's glögi is no exception. ## **Where We Stayed for Tallinn’s Christmas Market**
